monitoring.title: Monitoring
monitoring.subtitle: Prometheus Metrics
monitoring.no_config_message: Please configure the Prometheus URL above or in Settings.
monitoring.note1: Enter the Prometheus URL above or in Settings > Prometheus Configuration.
monitoring.note2: Metrics require node_exporter installed and configured on your nodes.
monitoring.note3: Queries use the /api/v1/query endpoint of Prometheus via the backend.
monitoring.note4: Metrics are updated manually via the "Refresh" button.
